summary: Added information about creating YouTube videos for educational purposes for Acornhoek Institute for Science and Technology in the tutor.html page. The information was added to the existing Acornhoek Institute content card, mentioning that Bright creates YouTube videos to extend his reach beyond the classroom and help students learn through digital content.
current_status: Tutor page updated to include YouTube video creation for Acornhoek Institute for Science and Technology. The page now reflects both in-person tutoring and digital educational content creation, showcasing a comprehensive approach to teaching and student support.
